issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.summary: Can't get Studio to work with iOS7.1
fields.environment:
OSX Mavricks 10.9. Xcode 5.1, Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.1.201402041146,Titanium SDK 3.2.3.v20140411160129 installed through CLI
TiApp details Titanium SDK set to 3.2.2.GA
App Run configuration details iOS SDK 7.1 Simulator 7.1 Device profile iPhone

comments.body: This is strange. May be some sort of caching issue as "npm install -g titanium" should have installed the latest GA version (3.2.2). Can you please try removing this package using "npm uninstall titanium" and then install it using the above command?
